name: Alfa-Boot
overview: Alfa-Boot is a Polish language adventure game with a point-and-click interface; the protagonist is a special agent, sent out to stop a radioactive leak in a nuclear submarine down in the ocean. The game uses a simple interface where the player can move a cursor around to select an object in the first-person-view image of the location he's in, and interact with this object in a number of ways. Many objects can be examined, with their descriptions appearing at the bottom of the screen. There is also an ever-present "go" option which allows the player to follow any exit out of the room, including those not visible on screen.
